description: Mobile techniques used by Sandworm Team, ATT&CK group G0034 (v4.1)
name: Sandworm Team (G0034)

techniques.comment: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) used SMS-based phishing to target victims with malicious links.(Citation: Leonard TAG 2023)
[Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) can collect encrypted Telegram and Signal communications.(Citation: mandiant_apt44_unearthing_sandworm)
